response.original_title: Breaking the Deal with My Hockey Bad Boy
response.overview: Breaking the Deal with My Hockey Bad Boy movie shows Jane Wellsy has a secret â€” she's got a crush on her stepbrother Nate Duncan. No one knows except for her worst enemy, hockey badboy Zach Gates. Even worse, Jane finds out Nate's new transfer student girlfriend was her bully from high school, Melissa! When Melissa finds Jane's smutty story and demands to know if it's about Nate, Zach swoops in to save her, kicking off their fake relationship to keep her secret safe. As they spend time together, Jane finds there's a warm, kind heart under Zach's cold bad boy persona, ready to heal her broken heart and face the world at her side
response.title: Breaking the Deal with My Hockey Bad Boy
